mapper.select: select id, room_key as roomKey, shop_name as shopName, last_seen_time as lastSeenTime from room_user_room where room_key = #{roomKey} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into room_user_room (room_key, shop_name, last_seen_time) values (#{roomKey}, #{shopName}, #{lastSeenTime}) on duplicate key update shop_name = values(shop_name), last_seen_time = values(last_seen_time)
